thread.title: Pardeep Pabla
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Pardeep Pabla

author: Pardeep Pabla
title: Pardeep Pabla
text: Molly Stevens helped us put together our first trip to CR!! She was amazing and helped us plan a great trip, with hotels, transport and excursions all booked together. Convenient. Will post after the trip as well. Thank you Costa Rican vacations and especially Molly. Recommend it for anyone planning to visit CR
